thread.title: Froglogic Releases Squish Coco 3.3 - Now With Patch Analysis
thread.title_full: Froglogic Releases Squish Coco 3.3 - Now With Patch Analysis - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Froglogic Releases Squish Coco 3.3 - Now With Patch Analysis
text:
Squish Coco 3.3 delivers Patch Analysis, speed improvements and more. Squish Coco is a complete cross-platform, cross-compiler code coverage tool chain allowing to analyze the code coverage of C, C++, C# and Tcl code.
Hamburg, Germany (PRWEB) September 09, 2015
Squish Coco provides advanced code coverage data analysis and reporting through the collection, comparison and merging of its test execution results.
» Value at every level of testing «
After an instrumented application's test suite run – unit, automated, manual, etc. – Squish Coco reveals valuable information, including:
Tested code Untested code Unreachable code Redundant tests Optimal test execution Patch Analysis (New!)
» Squish Coco 3.3 includes many new features and enhancements «
Patch Analysis Analyze the quality of a source code patch
Identify patch impact areas and the associated vulnerabilities
The analysis is based on the test coverage of the code section(s) impacted by the patch, and the historical execution results: the results prior to the patch being applied and the patched code being compiled or executed
Automatic exclusion of inconsistent headers from coverage analysis Speed improvements in multiple areas, including: Duplicate execution detection
Database merge instrumentations
HTML report generation
Generating list of executions for a given source line execution
Computing code coverage metrics
HTML Reports enhanced to display a tooltip indicating which tests execute a particular line of source code. Added support for importing comments and manual validations for projects checked out from varying directories. Read complete Squish Coco 3.3 release overview
» Learn More
Request a free and fully supported trial copy of Squish Coco More information about Squish Coco Questions or comments? Contact sales(at)froglogic.com
» About froglogic
froglogic GmbH is a software company based in Hamburg, Germany with additional offices in the USA with over 3,500 customers world-wide. froglogic is famous for its automated testing suite Squish with its flagship product Squish GUI Tester, the market-leading automated testing tool for GUI applications based on Qt, Java AWT/Swing, SWT/RCP and JavaFX, Mac OS X Carbon/Cocoa, Windows MFC, .NET and WPF, iOS Cocoa Touch, Android and for HTML/Ajax/Flex-based web applications running in a variety of web browsers. In addition, froglogic's offering includes the professional, cross-platform C, C++, C# and Tcl Code Coverage tool Squish Coco.
“froglogic” and “Squish” are registered trademarks of froglogic GmbH. All other trademarks are the properties of their respective owners.
